name: Rocks On Ice
description:
Rocks on Ice is the late-80s curling game for the NES that never happened. Face off against a friend in  classic curling, or try the target practice single player mode.

There's still some work to be done on this. The music could use a second pass, and there may still be bugs, but I'm happy with it otherwise!

For AGBIC 2018, inspired by this cartidge from the 2018 Famicase Exhibition.
